title: GUYS NEED HELP
body: MY FRIENDS ACC JUST GOT HACKED... PLS HELP ME... PLSSSSSSSSSSSS {{champion:427}}

replies.body: We can help!  Have your friend reach out to us through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) as soon as possible.  We'll work with him towards restoring access, so thanks for looking out for your friend!
